parameters.name: DataCenter
parameters.description:
The region from which logs are collected.

*   **cn**: Chinese mainland
*   **sg**: Singapore
*   **in**: India
*   **eu**: Europe
*   **us**: United States

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain names from which logs were collected. You can specify one or more domain names. Separate multiple domain names with commas (,).

parameters.name: SLSProject
parameters.description: The name of the log file.

parameters.name: SLSRegion
parameters.description: The region to which logs were delivered.
